reviews.title: Andrew Cohen
reviews.description: Barry is a top-notch Google Business consultant. My company is getting noticed and I'm seeing increased calls and contacts that are leading to good clients.  Barry understands search.  Critically, he takes the time to understand my business so the search results are meaningful and captures quality clients. I’d give more than 5 stars if I could.

reviews.title: Kelby Derenick
reviews.description: I highly recommend Barry for whatever digital marketing needs your business requires. I had no idea how to navigate a digital presence to reach more clients but Barry was able to take the reins and assist me through the entire process.  His expertise will certainly help any business get up and running or help an established business grow in the digital world. I will most certainly continue to  use The Bear Consulting Firm in the years ahead and I recommend  other businesses do the same!

reviews.title: Wendy Perez
reviews.description: Barry is great for digital marketing and always wants to make his clients happy. I recommend him to business that need his skills of marketing digitally

reviews.title: Dusty DePree
reviews.description: The Bear Consulting Firm is awesome to work with. Barry is sharp as they come, easy to work with and knows how to steer ships in the right direction, towards success. I am lucky to have crossed his path and it is a pleasure to work with him.

reviews.title: Eric Baker
reviews.description: Barry is not only a lifelong friend but an absolute expert when it comes to digital marketing.  I’m an independent insurance agent and the growth of my agency was unimaginable before I started working with Barry!  His attention to detail and knowledge of Internet marketing and google my home are second to none!  Most importantly, Barry really cares about each and every client like they are family and his passion for helping people grow their business is infectious!  I would highly recommend Barry to anyone wanting to grow their business and have fun while doing it!

reviews.title: Scott Neubauer
reviews.description: Barry has not only brought success to his clients beyond expectation, but he does it without being an annoying salesperson.  He is genuine, unique, funny, and a very knowledgable law firm digital marketing consultant.  Barry is extremely valuable to any law firm and is so good at trimming the fat when it comes to the marketing budget.   He is a trusted advisor, and anyone who gets to work with him understands what I am saying.  I highly recommend for all law firms to hire him for his unique skills with Google My Business optimization and all consultation needs.

reviews.title: J Jeffrey Herman
reviews.description: Barry is the best law firm consultant in the country.  He a force and a vigilante against the "Too Big to Fail" companies 😏.  He will guide you and take care of everything dealing with online marketing.

reviews.title: Ani Azadian
reviews.description: Barry is very responsive and always striving to help his clients. His approach is to take the proper channels to achieve longevity in marketing.

reviews.title: W SM
reviews.description: We have worked with Barry for several years and there is no one better with digital marketing consulting.  Specifically, he is a guru with the Google My Business listing optimization.  His service is second to none, and you can trust him like he is family.  He has your best interest at heart and always comes through.

reviews.title: Ronald Stitch
reviews.description: Barry is amazing. The work he does for our google business page generates leads. He is very professional and extremely responsive. We can't recommend Barry enough!

reviews.title: Stephanie Mahdavi
reviews.description: Barry is very knowledgeable and very honest. He has proven to our firm his worth on “Google My Business” listing. His skill sets are top notch. He took us by surprise when he generated big leads in our area. I would highly recommend him for all your marketing needs.  He is very wise when it comes to Google My Business. Incredible customer service, prompt, and brings in the clients.  Can’t ask for anything more!

reviews.title: George Azadian
reviews.description: Barry is an honest guy who has skills that bring in quality clients. He is always available and very responsive. Much appreciate his work on GMB (google my business), which is incredible. I  wish I could find a SEO guy who delivers like Barry does...

reviews.title: Ronald Stitch
reviews.description: Barry is not only the best at what he does he is an absolute pleasure to work with.  Not only does he generate leads that you thought were not possible, but he is friendly, professional, and truly cares about his clients.  If you want your business to grow you can't go wrong using this company!

reviews.title: Hilda Yavrouian
reviews.description: Barry is amazing! He is responsive, professional, patient and knowledgeable. The work he does for our business is solid. Our business page has generated a lot of business. Thank you!!

reviews.title: Carlos Perez
reviews.description: Barry Ryan has provided us with excellent advice, service, and support to our firm. Barry Ryan has demonstrated his unique skills and expertise in Law Firm Marketing. Listens to every request, explains everything to detail, and delivers. Truly the best. Won’t want to ask for anyone else.

reviews.title: Jamie Roth
reviews.description: Barry is one of the best in the industry. Very knowledgeable and very honest. He delivers what is promised and his skill set is top notch. I would highly recommend him for all your marketing needs.

reviews.title: Pamela Anderson
reviews.description: Barry is the absolute best! If you want jaw-dropping results with a quickness at a fair and reasonable price, he should be your go-to. He stands behind his word and delivers. Thank you, Barry!

reviews.title: Matt Russell
reviews.description: Barry has really helped our business grow with his leadership on our GMB page.  We are consistently in the local maps 3-pack and are very happy with the results!

reviews.title: Matt Kaufman
reviews.description: Barry is very knowledgeable about the Google search process  / business.  He helped my business out in many aspects of improving search results.

reviews.title: Eric Yavrouian
reviews.description: Barry and his group have been great to work with and to help increase visibility of our business.

reviews.title: Robert Yavrouian
reviews.description: Solid overall management of my google my business profile. Responsive and professional. Easily gets your return on investment in the business he generates.

reviews.title: Jared Berryman
reviews.description: Barry is very good at what he does.  If you need leads, he’s the guy to consult.

reviews.title: Brett Sherry
reviews.description: Barry is incredibly knowledgeable and experienced in this field and our firm has been pleased with the services he provides.

reviews.title: Ryan Okabe
reviews.description: Hands down the finest internet web consulting company!  Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Jeff Rager
reviews.description: Incredible customer service; friendly, prompt, and brings in the clients.  Can’t ask for anything more!
